entry.title: $2575 // NO FEE Huge UWS 1 BR Dishwasher Laundry Bright Storage
entry.content:
NO FEE Huge UWS 1 BR Dishwasher Laundry Bright Storage

CONTACT ALLISON 646.535.4289 adeutsch@calibernyc.com
Price: $2,575
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Building Amenities

Brownstone
Concierge
Diplomats OK
Laundry
Receiving Room
Subway
Valet

Apartment Amenities

City View
Dishwasher
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Marble Bath
NO FEE
Renovated
Walk In Closet

No Fee 1 Bedroom apartment is over 700sq ft!! Spacious, windowed kitchen features granite counters and stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. Bedroom is large enough for ANY size bed and other furniture. This home also boasts a windowed bath and hardwood floors that are highlighted by the sun streaming through the windows. Use the laundry and gym in the doorman building next door for no amenity fees!

Clean and well maintained building. This location is very convenient, 2 blocks from the 1 train. Pick up a new hobby at Krav Maga Experts or Wang Chen Table Tennis Club. Metro Diner is always a reliable spot to grab a bite, or try Noche Mexicana for Homestyle Mexican food.

ARE YOU RELOCATING TO NYC? Call me! I specialize in preparing you for the NYC rental process. I will walk you through everything from beginning to end. From helping you pick the right neighborhood for your lifestyle to connecting you with a COMPLIMENTARY CONCIERGE service to set up your utilities, obtain estimates from movers, and change your address with the post office. Moving is stressful, let me ease some of the burden. I have access to everything on the market and my goal is to always offer excellent customer service. If you want an honest agent who will really listen to your needs, give me a call. Instead of just looking for your next apartment, let me help you find a place you can truly call home. Call/Text/Email for more information or an appointment. Allison Deutsch [email protected] 646.535.4289
